mapper.select: select u.REALNAME,u.SEX,u.IDNUMBER,u.ACADEMIC,u.HOUSED,f.USERTEL from TB_USERREAL u join TB_FWDLOGIN f on u.USERID = f.USERID where f.USERID = #{USERID}
select AVAILABLEBALANCE,RECEIVEPRINCIPAL, CREDITLINE,RETURNAMOUNT,FREEZINGAMOUNT,SURPLUSCREDITLINE from TB_ACCOUNT where USERID = #{USERID}
mapper.update: update TB_BIDINFO set BIDSTATE=#{BIDSTATUS},BIDISSUEDATE = sysdate,BIDDEADDATE = sysdate + #{DAY} where ID = #{ID}
